content.description: Route goes straight up main wall, staying to the right of the lichened arête on lower half to a wet right sloping ledge. Continue straight up from there through small roof and big chockstone. Lower half is run out between pro. Further cleaning could make it safer.
content.location: Around the corner climbers right of Moose Horn. Start from same ledge as Penthouse Bliss.

climbs.name: Woody
climbs.fa: 02/03/2008 by Pat Henner and Mike Dannhardt

content.description: Climb a shallow corner with an orange spot on the left. At top of corner move left and up towards a roof. Exit on right side of roof under the big tooth and find your way to the top through more woody brush.
content.location: Starting just North of Almost Severance, push through some brush.

content.description: Climb the wall following the thin flake centered under the huge triangular shaped roof. At the roof and traverse right until you clear the roof and can continue up to the top.
content.location: start just right of Penthouse Bliss

content.description: Pull over the first low roof, cross a short brushy ledge and climb up to a hand width vertical crack. Head up the crack, over the bulge to another big roof. Pull over that to the top.
content.location: Starts between Almost Severance and Woody under a big, low juggy roof.

content.description: Go straight up through small overhang at the very top.
content.protection: trad rack. I put a PG. There is section about half way up that is easy climbing but takes no gear. Then there is a final small roof that some may find hard to protect. I think you could bypass the roof maybe by going right but never tried it.
content.location: Begin right of the big overhanging triangular roof and just right of the gully. Up face with small pockets and ledges.

content.description: Climb up to a bolt on a right facing bulge. Continue straight up through a notch in a small roof (same notch that Crispy Finish goes through). On easier ground move slightly right and climb out by going straight up over the large roof.
content.location: Begin right of the Inside the Rubiks Cube.

content.description:
Climb up the right facing corner formed by a 15 foot spire that is detached from the cliff and forms a nice fist size crack with it. Near top move to the outside of the spire and gain the top.

Continue slightly right and up until even with small tree on left. Climb diagonal up and right to small cramped ledge with medium sized loose boulder. Place good pro and then move straight up through the small roof with crack in it.

[Edit - loose boulder under the final roof has been trundled.]
content.location: Start on the wall under the left side of the huge triangular shaped roof.

content.description:
Climb the arête adjacent to the tree to a point roughly midway up the rock to the right facing rounded horn that gives the route its name. Traverse diagonally left to two prominent right-facing flakes, them move up and left to a small ledge. The crux is near the top.

Moose Horn stops about 25ft from the top. Moose Head continues to the top.

This route seems to be a crowd favorite.
content.location: Start at the small oak tree 30 feet to climber's left of Penthouse Bliss.

climbs.name: Inside the Rubik's Cube
climbs.fa: 02/03/2008 by Mike Dannhardt and Pat Henner

content.description: Climb into the Cube then right and up along a nice hand crack. Meet up with the Crispy Finish route for the finish.
content.location: Climb up to a small ledge under the blocky hole called the Cube.

content.description: Climb till hitting a blank section then move right around the arête and into the chimney gully. Climb up to a small tree on the right and then move back onto the arête. Continue moving up and slightly left angling for a triangular shaped block with sharp point to the right. Climb around that and finish moving left and up
content.location: Start on the arête below and to the right of the big overhanging triangular roof.

content.description:
Go straight up to a small right facing overhang. Climb around this to small ledge. Continue move up and left along a small smooth corner to gain a wide ledge with a nice horizontal crack for pro.

At the ledge move left into a corner then up through a slight overhang. Above the overhang move left out over thin air and then up to a wide ledge.

Continue to the left on the ledge out from under the large roof and then straight up the slightly overhung ledges. Last ledge to the top is crunchy with lichens!
content.location: Begin 10 yard right of the large blocky alcove in the cliff face (the Inside the Rubiks Cube route) on the rocky shelf.

content.description: Climb straight up the gully. Move through an awkward constriction near the top to finish.
content.location: Start in the gully to the right of the big overhanging triangular roof.

content.description:
Up to a small right facing beak looking overhang. Climb around this to small ledge. Continue move up and left along a small smooth corner to gain a wide ledge with a nice horizontal crack for pro.

At the horizontal crack, traverse right to clear the overhang and start up again through the break. Be careful pulling over the small overhang not to pull hand holds off! Gain another stance above the overhang, note the large loose tooth then continue up to the finish.
content.location: Same as Crispy. Begin 10 yard right of the blocky alcove in the cliff face (the Inside the Rubiks Cube route)
